column1: '''''The Lord of the Rings: War in the North''''' is the soundtrack to ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]''. The soundtrack is availeble at Itunes and Amazon. All tracks were composed by [[Inon Zur]] and recorded in the Abbey Road studios.<ref>{{webcite
*[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]
